Interfaces

Interface TabletRelatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GalaxyTablet, iPadTablet, NexusTablet, Tablet

    public interface TabletRelatable
    MP1 Requirement: "Provide an interface called TabletRelatable with the following methods: • String FindLargestDisplayTablet(Tablet [] tablets ); • String FindLowestCostTablet(Tablet [] tablets); • String FindNumberOfCreatedTabletTypes(Tablet [] tablets); • String FindLightestWeightTabletType(Tablet [] tablets); Implement this interface in the Tablet class. Why?" Why? Because it allows the methods to be implemented in the base (or super class), making the methods available to all sub classes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String findLargestDisplayTablet(Tablet[] tablets)
      Method that can be used to find the tablet or tablets having the largest display size in an array of tablets.
      java.lang.String findLightestWeightTabletType(Tablet[] tablets)
      Method that can be used to find the lightest tablet or tablets in an array of tablets.
      java.lang.String findLowestCostTablet(Tablet[] tablets)
      Method that can be used to find the tablet or tablets having the lowest cost in an array of tablets.
      java.lang.String findNumberOfCreatedTabletTypes(Tablet[] tablets)
      Method that can be used to find the count of each tablet type in a given array of tablets.

        Returns:
        string value identifying the number of tablets of each type.
